titulo: Líder de Data Science Contact Center
requisitos:

Experiencia avanzada con MySQL y creación de consultas complejas.
Sólido conocimiento en machine learning aplicado al forecasting y clasificación.

Familiaridad con los KPIs propios del sector contact center (AHT, ASA, SL, FCR, etc.).
Experiencia comprobada en creación y optimización de procesos ETL.
Manejo de estándares y buenas prácticas: SOLID, entornos virtuales, y normas de codificación PEP-8.
Preferiblemente certificación o conocimiento en metodología COPC.

Liderazgo efectivo y orientación a resultados.
Excelentes habilidades analíticas y de resolución de problemas.
Comunicación clara y efectiva con equipos técnicos y stakeholders.
Capacidad para trabajar bajo presión y gestionar prioridades.

Te ofrecemos un plan carrera

Aporta tu experiencia y habilidades para contribuir al éxito continuo de nuestro equipo.
Únete a nosotros y sé parte de un proyecto que impacta positivamente en la vida de nuestros clientes y colaboradores.

Estudiantes de mínimo tercer semestre en Ingeniería de sistemas, administración, estadística y/o afines.
Experiencia: 12 meses (1 año) en Call Centers, preferiblemente en áreas de Apoyo de Operaciones.
Conocimientos:
Habilidades de redacción, digitación y comprensión de audios.
Manejo de sistemas informáticos.
Análisis estadístico básico, medio, avanzado mediante manejo de lenguajes R, Python y SQL.
Conocimiento en la creación de tableros de Control por herramientas como: DataStudio, Power PI, Tableau, looker.
Manejo avanzado de herramientas ofimáticas (Excel, Access, Ppt).
Conocimientos básicos de administración
Conocimientos de análisis y manejo de datos.

Tendrás contrato a término indefinido.
Todas las prestaciones de ley.
Excelente ambiente laboral, estabilidad, aprendizaje y oportunidades de crecimiento.

titulo: Practicante universitario en ciencia de datos o data science (Vacante de Inclusión Cafam)

requisitos:
Qualifications:
Proven experience as a Data Scientist, Data Analyst, or similar role in data-driven environments.
Proficiency in Python, R, or other programming languages commonly used in data science.
Experience with machine learning frameworks such as scikit-learn, TensorFlow, or Keras.
Strong knowledge of statistics, data modeling techniques, and predictive analytics.
Familiarity with data visualization tools like Tableau, Power BI, or Matplotlib.
Strong proficiency in English (B2 or C1 level) with excellent communication skills, including the ability to present complex data insights to a variety of audiences.
Experience with databases and SQL for data querying and manipulation.
Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
Ability to work independently and manage time effectively in a remote environment.
Preferred Qualifications:
Degree in Computer Science, Data Science, Statistics, Mathematics, or a related field.
Experience with big data technologies
Familiarity with cloud platforms such as AWS, Google Cloud, or Microsoft Azure.
Why work with us?
Competitive salary and benefits package.
Fully remote work environment.
Opportunities for career growth and professional development.
Collaborative, inclusive, and innovative team culture.
Work on cutting-edge projects with global impact.

Habilidades Técnicas:
- Experiencia sólida en *SQL y MySQL* .
- Manejo de herramientas de BI, preferiblemente *Power BI* .
- Conocimiento básico de ETL y tratamiento de grandes volúmenes de datos .
- Deseable: Conocimientos en *Python, **R*, o herramientas como Tableau o Looker .
- Experiencia con almacenamiento en la nube (*AWS RDS, **Azure SQL*) .
- Control de versiones con *Git* .

Habilidades Blandas:
- Capacidad analítica para extraer insights relevantes .
- Comunicación efectiva para presentar resultados a equipos no técnicos .
- Trabajo en equipo y enfoque colaborativo .
- Pensamiento crítico y enfoque en la mejora continua .
- Organización y gestión del tiempo .

*Formación y Experiencia*
- Profesional en Informática, Ingeniería de Sistemas, Estadística o carreras afines.
- Mínimo 2-3 años de experiencia en roles similares.

Qualifications:

 BS in Information Technology, Computer Science / Engineering and 5- 10 years of relevant experience. Relevant certifications (e.g., CISSP, CISM, CEH) are highly desirable.
 Experience with securing on-premises servers and virtualization technologies (e.g., VMware, Hyper-V).
 Proficiency in securing cloud platforms (AWS, Azure) and familiarity with cloud security controls and services.
 Proven experience working in cybersecurity roles, with a focus on on-premise servers and cloud environments.
 Demonstrated experience in vulnerability assessment and penetration testing tools and methodologies.
 Experience with security incident response, including analyzing and mitigating security incidents.
 Familiarity with security and compliance requirements for the shipping and logistics industry.
 Self-motivated, detail-oriented, and able to work both independently and as part of a team in a fast-paced environment.
 Strong writing and collaboration skills, with the ability to effectively convey complex security concepts to technical and non-technical stakeholders as well as keep cybersecurity documentation up to date and current.
 Ability to work in an Agile / Scrum environment.

QUALIFICATIONS & SKILLS
B2+, C1 english
Bachelors degree in Computer Science, or related field (or equivalent experience).
Practical experience with chatbot frameworks (e.g., Dialogflow, IBM Watson) and AI/ML-driven solutions.
Familiarity with conversation design principles and omnichannel contact center strategies.
Strong data analysis capabilities (experience with analytics tools, KPIs, etc.).
Excellent project management skills, with the ability to lead cross-functional initiatives and manage vendor relationships.

QUALIFICATIONS & SKILLS
English b2+, C1
Bachelors degree in Computer Science, IT, or related field (or equivalent experience).
Hands-on experience with IVR platforms (e.g., Genesys, Cisco, Avaya) and voice automation tools.
Proficiency in scripting/programming (e.g., VXML, Java, Python).
Familiarity with cloud-based contact center solutions (e.g., Amazon Connect).
Strong analytical skills to drive data-based decisions and continuous improvements. - Excellent communication skills to collaborate with cross-functional teams and Verizon management.

What Were Looking For:
C1/B2+ English skills, enough to deliver.
Bachelors degree in Computer Science or related field (preferred).
Proficient in Microsoft Office Suite, Excel, Teams, and enrollment/billing software.
5+ years of experience in .NET development (C, ASP.NET, MVC, SQL Server).
Expertise in data processing, performance tuning, and handling large datasets.
Strong knowledge of server-side development, API integrations, and database management.
Familiarity with HIPAA, CMS, Medicaid, Medicare, and other compliance regulations (preferred).
Strong logical thinking and ability to create intuitive software solutions.
Experience with big data and high-volume transactions.
Proficient in SQL for database management and query optimization.
Ability to adapt to shifting priorities in a fast-paced environment.
Microsoft or AWS certification is a plus.

Interested?
Send us your resume and lets get started! We cant wait to hear from you!

titulo: Work From Home Network Engineer / Ref. 0044
requisitos:
Heres what we are looking for:

- Associates Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Business, or related field required or 2 years of relevant experience in lieu of a degree.
- 5+ years of experience in Network Administrator, Network Operations, or related experience.
- Hands-on experience with two or more of these technologies: Cisco Routing/Switching (LAN/WAN), Cisco ASA Security, Cisco Wireless, Cisco Telephony, Avaya Telephony (Unified Communications).
- Advanced English level.

Required Skills/Experience:
• 3+ years of experience delivering excellent customer service, including the ability to explain complex technical information clearly to both business and technical audience.
• 2+ years of hands-on experience with a strong technical foundation in Linux, shell scripting, data handling, SQL, and PL/SQL scripting. Possesses excellent analytical skills and will apply this expertise to analyze and resolve customer issues.
• Hands-on knowledge and practical integration experience with enterprise software applications.
• Proven experience with troubleshooting methodologies and demonstrated problem-solving abilities.
• Excellent organizational skills and the ability to effectively manage tasks, set priorities, and meet deadlines.
• Excellent verbal and written communication skills and the ability to collaborate effectively within a team environment.
• Demonstrated ability to bridge communication gaps between technical and business stakeholders.
• Bachelor's degree in computer science (or equivalent).
• A passion for technology and a willingness to learn and adapt to emerging technologies and trends.
• Willingness to travel up to 10%.
Valuable Technical skills:
• Deep understanding of Linux and Unix environments is essential, including shell scripting for automation, system management, and troubleshooting.
• Experience with scripting languages like Python and Perl, along with general programming knowledge in Java. Familiarity with web technologies (HTML, CSS, JSP, XML, XSLT) is beneficial for troubleshooting and supporting web applications.
• Strong database skills are crucial, including experience with relational database management systems (RDBMS) such as Oracle, PostgreSQL, SQL Server, and DB2. PL/SQL experience is also a valuable asset.
• Practical operational experience with installing, maintaining, and deploying applications and code within Amazon Web Services (AWS) is essential.
• Familiarity with configuring and testing REST API calls and web services is important for integrating and supporting modern applications.
Valuable Business and Data Analysis skills:
• Exposure to CRM tools like Salesforce and ERP systems like Oracle or SAP is a plus, demonstrating an understanding of core business applications.
• Exposure or experience within the sales domain is advantageous, providing context for supporting sales-related applications and processes.
• Familiarity with cloud-native data platforms (e.g., Snowflake, Amazon Redshift, Google BigQuery), data lakes, data marts, and data warehouses is required.
• Experience with HTAP, Hadoop, Spark, or other Big Data technologies is highly desirable.
• Experience with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP) and cloud-based data services is necessary.
• Familiarity with ETL tools (e.g., Informatica, Talend, AWS Glue, Oracle/Pentaho DI, Azure Data Factory) is important.
• Familiarity with Business Intelligence tools (e.g., MicroStrategy, Tableau, Power BI, Business Objects, Cognos) is beneficial for supporting data-driven decision-making.

titulo: Trabajo Desde Casa Científico de Datos Senior / Ref. 0960
requisitos:
¿Qué Buscamos?:

- 3+ años de experiencia en Data Science / Data Engineer, aprendizaje automático, IA, estadística y otras áreas relacionadas.
- Dominio de SQL.
- Dominio de Python, R u otro lenguaje de programación importante.
- Excelentes habilidades de comunicación y capacidad para colaborar y establecer relaciones con usuarios no técnicos.
- Sólidos conocimientos de probabilidad y estadística, incluido el diseño experimental, el modelado predictivo, la optimización y la inferencia causal.
- Experiencia práctica con el aprendizaje automático, como la clasificación por regresión, la agrupación, las redes neuronales, la selección de características, la validación cruzada, la maldición de la dimensionalidad, el equilibrio entre sesgo y varianza, la explicabilidad del modelo, la PNL, etc.
